MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH7 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Elm Row and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.27am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Annandale Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.58am on Thursday 3rd December 2020
